LanguageData.NeedSlaveBedsDesc:
You have more slaves than you have slave beds. Someone will lack a place to sleep.

Either make more beds, or change a colonist or prisoner bed to a slave bed.

If you have no resources, sleeping spots are free and can be placed instantly.
LanguageData.SlavesUnsuppressedDesc: {0_nameDef}'s suppression level is dangerously low. There is a good chance {0_pronoun} will rebel.\n\nMake sure there is a colonist assigned to warden work. Wardens will suppress slaves periodically to stop them from rebelling.
LanguageData.SlavesUnattendedDesc: Some slaves are alone on a map with no able-bodied colonists around.\n\nSlaves left unattended like this are very likely to rebel within days or hours.
LanguageData.RitualTargetsExplanation: To begin the ritual, select a focus object and click the 'Begin {RITUAL_label}' command. The following are valid focus objects:\n{1}
LanguageData.RitualRolesExplanation: Following roles have a part in {RITUAL_label}:\n{1}
LanguageData.RitualUnfilledRoles: In order to perform {0} you need to fill these roles
LanguageData.IdeoBuildingRoomRequirementsDesc: In order to dignify {0}, these room requirements must be met
LanguageData.QuestPartRaidsDelayDesc: Raids will start arriving in {0}.\n\nThe raiders will target the spacedrone and attempt to destroy it. Protect the spacedrone so your colonists can hack its computer and retrieve the data.
LanguageData.IdeoRolesEmptyDesc:
These roles are not filled:
{0}

You can assign someone a role on their Social tab.

If these roles remain empty, the following people will be unhappy
LanguageData.AncientAltarThreatsWakingDesc: Security threats will activate in {0}. They will attack any who may threaten the relic.
LanguageData.AlertNoRecentSlaughterDesc: No large {0} animal has been slaughtered recently. This is a requirement of the following ideoligions
LanguageData.AlertNoRecentSlaughterDescPost: If no slaughter is performed, these colonists will remain unhappy
LanguageData.AlertRitualComingDesc: A ritual opportunity is coming soon for following rituals
LanguageData.AlertRitualComingExtra: Opportunities expire after {0} days, and reoccur on the same day each year.
LanguageData.AlertAgeReversalDemandDesc: Because of their beliefs, some of your colonists demand regular age reversal treatments in a biosculpter pod. If they don't get the treatments, they will be displeased.\n\nThe following people demand age reversal treatment
LanguageData.AlertAgeReversalDemandDesc_Recruit: {PAWN} joined {FACTION} recently, and wants to begin age reversal treatments in {DURATION}.
LanguageData.AlertRoyalTitleNoVeneratedAnimalMeat: {PAWN_nameDef}'s belief in {IDEO_name} prevents {PAWN_objective} from eating the meat of {ANIMALS}.
LanguageData.AlertGauranlenTreeWithoutDryadTypeDesc: One or more Gauranlen trees do not have their dryad caste set.\n\nSelect the tree and click the '{0}' button to set produced dryad caste.
LanguageData.AlertConnectedPawnNotAssignedToPlantCutt: Connector not assigned to plant cutting
You have Gauranlen trees which are set to be pruned, but their connectors are not assigned to plant cutting.\n\nYou should assign plant cutting work to the following people
LanguageData.AlertFuelNodeIgnitingDesc: A fuel node has ignited! It will melt down and explode very soon.\n\nGet away and be ready to fight or escape the fires.
LanguageData.AlertInfestationArrivingDesc: Giant insects have sensed your activity and are burrowing up from underground to attack. Infestations are about to begin.
LanguageData.AlertHostilesWakingUpDesc: One or more {0_pawnsPlural} are waking up.\n\nThey will attack if they find you.
LanguageData.AlertCasketOpeningDesc: Cryptosleep caskets containing unknown threats are opening soon.
